00007 int modules::navigator::LoadConfigFile(const char* filename){
00008     // Check we haven't already opened a modules file
00009     if(fModulesLoaded ==true) {
00010             cout<<"Error: Loading a new modules file, when one was already loaded"<<endl;
00011             return 1;
00012     }
00013     // Read in the file and dump the processed options
00014     modules::reader modules_file;
00015     int retVal=modules_file.ReadFile(filename);
00016     if(retVal!=0) return retVal;
00017     modules_file.PrintAllOptions();
00018 
00019     // Check the file contained at least one module
00020     size_t num_modules=modules_file.GetNumModules();
00021     if(num_modules==0){
00022             cout<<"Warning: No modules were requested for use, so there's nothing to be done!"<<endl;
00023             return 2;
00024     }
00025     cout<<"Number of modules requested: "<<num_modules<<endl;
00026 
00027     // Loop over each requested module and build it
00028     // If we have any problems making a module then stop running
00029     modules::factory* mgr = modules::factory::Instance();
00030     std::string name;
00031     modules::options* opts;
00032     BaseModule* mod=NULL;
00033     for(unsigned i=0;i<num_modules;i++){
00034             name = modules_file.GetModule(i);
00035             opts =  modules_file.GetOptions(i);
00036             cout<<"Creating module: "<<name<<endl;
00037             cout<<"With options:"<<endl;
00038             opts->DumpOptions("  ");
00039             mod = mgr->createModule(name,opts);
00040             if(mod) AddModule(name, mod);
00041             else return 3;
00042     }
00043 
00044     // Everything finished ok
00045     fModulesLoaded=true;
00046     return 0;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void modules::navigator::AddModule(const std::string& name, BaseModule* mod){
00050     fModules.push_back(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00051     fModulesSearch.insert(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00052 }
